title: Capitol Reef National Park: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit        Scenic Drive in the winter NPS          Park Map Take a look at the park map to start your trip planning          Trip Planner The trip planner can help you plan all your adventures in Capitol Reef.            Operating Hours and Seasons Capitol Reef National Park is open year round.          Directions Located in south central Utah, Capitol Reef is located in Wayne County, neighbored by the town of Torrey, UT         Fees and Passes Entrance fees, passes and permits, find out everything you need to know         Things to Do Hiking, driving, camping, biking, and more!         Camping in Capitol Reef Capitol Reef National Park has one developed campground and two primitive campgrounds.          Eating & Sleeping Capitol Reef National Park does not have a lodge or restaurant. The Wayne County Travel Council has information for services available in Wayne County, Utah.          Things to Know Before You Come Weather, pets, accessibility, and other details to help you prepare.         Brochures Maps, trip planner, hiking guides, geology information and more.         Your Safety Educate yourself to stay safe.
